page.title: 13Lifestyles
page.content: A Change in Lifestyle from Town to Country is described here by an 11 year old boy. I now live in Hemingbrough, but I used to live near Wakefield. Life in the country is a lot different to life in the town, its not as fast, busy or as noisy. The atmosphere is happier and friendlier. The village is presented nicer and there is no heavy bustling traffic. The thing I like best about this area is the people, they are very friendly and welcoming. When I moved to the area I was very surprised to find no smelling fish and chip shops or roaring motorways. All in all I think I prefer the country to the town.
